examples: he tried to help the really down-and-out bums

definitions.text: a person who engages freely in promiscuous sex
a foot traveler; someone who goes on an extended walk (for pleasure)
a commercial steamer for hire; one having no regular schedule
a long walk usually for exercise or pleasure
examples: she enjoys a hike in her spare time

definitions.text: travel on foot, especially on a walking expedition
examples: We went tramping about the state of Colorado

definitions.text: walk heavily and firmly, as when weary, or through mud
examples: Mules plodded in a circle around a grindstone
We had to tramp the creeks

definitions.text: move about aimlessly or without any destination, often in search of food or employment
examples: The cattle roam across the prairie
the laborers drift from one town to the next
They rolled from town to town
